column5: Master Bedroom = 1 Queen  2nd Bedroom = 1 Twin, 1 Bunk (lower bunk full, upper bunk twin) Living room has sofa sleeper Maximum occupancy = 6 Patio  View: Courtyard  Floor: 1st Floor  Other Features Color cable TV w/DVD in Living area. Color cable TV in each bedroom. Modern fully equipped kitchen with over range micro hood & fast heating flat top stove.  Washer/Dryer in condominium  Iron & Ironing Board 1 Parking space that will fit 2 cars one parked behind the other
column8: First floor 2 bedroom condo short walk to beach aq
